00019 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00020 #ifdef BOOST_NO_STD_WSTREAMBUF
00021 #error "wide char i/o not supported on this platform"
00022 #else
00023 
00024 #include <boost/archive/text_wiarchive.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/archive/detail/polymorphic_iarchive_route.hpp>
00026 
00027 namespace boost { 
00028 namespace archive {
00029 
00030 typedef detail::polymorphic_iarchive_route<
00031         text_wiarchive_impl<naked_text_wiarchive> 
00032 > polymorphic_text_wiarchive;
00033 
00034 } // namespace archive
00035 } // namespace boost
00036 
00037 // required by export
00038 BOOST_SERIALIZATION_REGISTER_ARCHIVE(
00039     boost::archive::polymorphic_text_wiarchive
00040 )
00041 
00042 #endif // BOOST_NO_STD_WSTREAMBUF
